DOC.detailed_description: PURPOSE : To compare incidence anal erosion 2 indwell fecal management system . Anal erosion defi ned localize mucous membrane tissue impairment anal canal cause corrosive fecal enzyme and/or indwell device . DESIGN : Randomized comparative effectiveness clinical trial compare 2 commercially available indwell fecal management system . SUBJECTS AND SETTING : The target population adult care medical , surgical , neurological intensive care unit ( ICUs ) non-ICU unit order indwell fecal management system placement . The research set 1200-bed quaternary-care medical center Midwestern United States . Seventy-nine patient participate study ; 41 receive system A 38 received system B . Subjects ' mean age 64 ± 13.6 year ( mean ± SD ) , 52 % female .
